seo.title: Personal Belongings Shipping Germany to Spain | Intrelo
seo.description: Moving from Germany to Spain in 5–7 days. Direct road transport within the EU, no customs. Professional packing, insurance, door-to-door.

og.title: Moving from Germany to Spain — 5–7 Days EU Direct
og.description: Direct road transport, no customs within EU. Door-to-door service.

lsi_keywords: moving to spain from germany cost
moving to canary islands from germany

hero.subtitle: We were the official carrier of the Queen of Britain. Direct road transport from Germany to Spain in 5–7 days. No customs within the EU. Packing, insurance, door-to-door delivery. Climate-aware packing for Mediterranean conditions.

process.title: How your move to Spain works
process.subtitle: Both countries are EU members — no customs, no duties. Direct delivery by road via France in 5–7 days.

items.text: Consultation — send photos/videos via WhatsApp. Free on-site survey anywhere in Germany.
On-site packing — thermal protection for electronics (temperature difference DE→ES). Photo inventory.
Consolidation warehouse — palletising, labelling, groupage if needed.
No customs within the EU — free movement. CMR and transport documents only.
Direct route via France: Germany → Strasbourg → Lyon → Barcelona/Madrid in 5–7 days.
No reloading — direct delivery by a single vehicle door to door.
Delivery anywhere in Spain — Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Malaga, Marbella, Canary Islands.
Floor delivery — crews experienced with Spanish buildings (narrow stairs, old structures).
Unpacking, placement, furniture assembly. Packaging disposal included.

packing.subtitle: Direct EU route with no reloadings. Focus on thermal protection for climate difference and vibration protection for long road journey.

Vacuum bags for bulky winter items
Individual shoe packing
Anti-static film + thermal protection for laptops and monitors
Original boxes or custom crating for appliances
Shock absorbers for long road journey
Multi-layer dish packing with dividers
Picture boxes with vibration damping
Custom foam inserts for figurines and décor

faq.title: FAQ: Moving from Germany to Spain
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about moving within the EU

items.a: No. Both countries are EU members — no customs required. Free movement of goods. Only transport documents (CMR) needed.

items.q: How long does the move take?
items.a: By road via France — 5–7 days. By sea — 14–21 days. By air — 1–2 days. To islands (Canaries, Balearics) — add 3–7 days by ferry.

items.q: How do you protect items from heat?
items.a: Thermal wrapping for electronics and delicate items. Ventilated trucks. Delivery scheduled around temperature conditions.

items.q: Can you deliver to the Canary Islands?
items.a: Yes. Road to mainland Spain port, then sea to Canaries. Total time 10–25 days depending on volume.
Road: from ~€350/m³. One-bedroom apartment (~10 m³) — from €3,500. Sea is cheaper but slower. Free quote.
When relocating permanently, you need to do Abmeldung (deregistration). We don't handle paperwork but can advise on procedure.

items.q: Do you serve Ibiza and Mallorca?
items.a: Yes. Balearic Islands — road + ferry from Barcelona or Valencia. 7–14 days. Door delivery on the island.

items.q: Are there taxes when moving to Spain?
items.a: Personal belongings within the EU are not subject to duties or VAT. NIE registration in Spain may be needed — we offer guidance.

items.q: How do I track my shipment?
items.a: GPS tracking throughout. Updates at every stage. 24/7 WhatsApp contact with your manager.
We specialise in personal belongings. For vehicle transport, we can recommend partners.
